name: Destructivator 2 (Pug Fugly Games)
description:
Destructivator 2 is a fast action platform shooter, with sharp colourful graphics that brings 90's arcade action smashing into your senses!

  • Take on 50+ levels set across 6 worlds
  • Use the enemy ships against them
  • Take on an army of enemies
  • Traverse traps set to ensnare you
  • Test your skills against challenging bosses
  • Die a lot
  • Choose from Easy, Normal & Brutal skill level
